page.title: 03A day in the life of Mary
page.content: An ordinary school day for me starts about 5.30. At 6.00 I have a breakfast of cornflakes with goats'milk. After breakfast I get dressed, milk the {goats,}and then I let out the{ducks. It takes about 15 minutes to milk the goats. After I've milked them I give them hay and water. It's about 7.00 by the time I've finished. At 8.45 I catch the school coach. By the time we reach school it's about 9.00 but school starts at 9.15. In the morning we do{Maths}and{English.}At 10.30 we have Assembly and then a break. We come in from break at 11.00. Afternoon is usually project work, music, art, or games. When I go home I usually make cheese from goats' milk, herbs and salt. I then go to bed at about 9.00.
